titles.title: Advocating for Small Business Act
Advocating for Small Business Act
Advocating for Small Business Act

To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to establish Offices of Small Business within rule writing divisions of the Securities and Exchange Commission to coordinate on rules and policy priorities related to capital formation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 50 - 4.
Reported by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 119-250.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 207.

committee.name: House Financial Services
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
